shortdesc.i: This event is fired by the system. If you want to listen to the event you can do so using the document.addEventListener function and remove the listener using the document.removeEventListener function.The keyboardOpened event is triggered when the virtual keyboard has finished sliding into view of the application.

dd.p: The callback function that will be invoked on the keyboardOpened event.

p.pre:
<script type="text/javascript">

                function onKeyboardOpened() {
                    console.log("Keyboard opened event occured.");
                }

                document.addEventListener("keyboardOpened", onKeyboardOpened);

                </script>
